thread.title: Latest "Spectre" trailer reveals Craig, Waltz showdown
thread.title_full: Latest "Spectre" trailer reveals Craig, Waltz showdown

title: Latest "Spectre" trailer reveals Craig, Waltz showdown
text:
Latest "Spectre" trailer reveals Craig, Waltz showdown 7:34pm BST - 00:45 
The latest trailer for ''Spectre,'' the next film in the James Bond franchise, premieres. Bob Mezan reports.   
James Bond fans got a special treat on Friday (October 02) as the latest trailer for "Spectre" was released. The new promo reveals a showdown between Bond himself, Daniel Craig, and his latest nemesis portrayed by Christoph Waltz. The trailer is also chock full of action sequences, including Bond narrowly escaping a falling building and a stomach-churning helicopter ride. "Spectre," which is due out in November, will be Craig's fourth turn at James Bond. The last film, "Skyfall," earned more than 1 billion dollars at the global box office.  //reut.rs/1YV5Cdo
